short_description: Hero character stands at the edge of a cliff, contemplating the vast fantasy landscape before them, with a mix of determination and uncertainty

objects.description: The hero character, dressed in worn and tattered attire, with elements hinting at their noble quest or destiny, standing with feet shoulder-width apart and arms spread wide or clasped behind their back
objects.shape_and_color: Silhouetted against the sky, with warm orange tones on their face and body, and cool teal tones in the shadows
objects.appearance_details: Determined yet uncertain facial expression, with a focus on their profile
objects.pose: Standing with feet shoulder-width apart, with arms spread or clasped behind their back
objects.orientation: Facing away from the camera, looking out at the landscape

background_setting: A vast fantasy landscape stretching out to the horizon, with a deep foreboding blue sky, and clouds that seem to stretch on forever, casting long ominous shadows across the landscape

lighting.conditions: Rembrandt lighting setup, with a warm 3200K Key Light and a cool Fill Light
lighting.direction: 45-degree angle to the character's face, coming from the side opposite the landscape
lighting.shadow: Soft and gentle, with a triangle of light under the character's eye on the shadow side of their face

aesthetics.composition: Rule of thirds, with the character's profile at one of the intersections, and the horizon line of the landscape placed along one of the top or bottom thirds lines
aesthetics.color_scheme: Teal/Orange color contrast, with warm tones on the character and cool tones in the background
aesthetics.mood_atmosphere: Contemplative and awe-inspiring, with a sense of uncertainty and determination

photographic_characteristics.depth_of_field: Medium to deep, with an aperture of f/5.6 to f/8
photographic_characteristics.focus: Sharp on the character, with a gradual decline in sharpness towards the background
photographic_characteristics.camera_angle: Slightly low angle, about 2-3 feet below the character's eye level
